tree.name: Simone Fontecchio
tree.tradeDescription: MIA sent Duncan Robinson to DET for Simone Fontecchio. MIA also received a trade exception.
tree.note: Traded from Detroit for Duncan Robinson

assetsGivenUp.name: Duncan Robinson
assetsGivenUp.note: Undrafted, signed by MIA in 2018. Re-signed July 7, 2025, then traded same day.
